snippet: Contributions of $1 million would get exclusive access to an array of inaugural festivities, including two parade bleacher seats and four tickets to the president’s official inaugural ball.
abstract: Pres Obama's finance team is offering corporations and other institutions that contribute $1 million exclusive access to an array of inaugural festivities, including two parade bleacher seats and four tickets to the president’s official inaugural ball.
lead_paragraph: Contributions of $1 million would get exclusive access to an array of inaugural festivities, including two parade bleacher seats and four tickets to the president’s official inaugural ball.

headline.seo: Obama Team Outlines Donor Packages for Inauguration
